title: [K-12] Blended Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Program for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous/synchronous blended learning environment utilizing mobile devices and LMS (Learning Management System)

learning_goals: Learners can perform eight core nursing competencies (medication management, patient assessment, emergency care) with 80% or greater accuracy in blended learning environments
Learners can engage in self-directed learning at least twice weekly through mobile microlearning modules and document progress in learning logs
Learners can enhance critical thinking and clinical judgment skills through peer and self-assessment in online discussion forums and virtual simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
